actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 to provide loans to certain local governments required to comply with occupational safety and health standards under State plans approved by the Secretary of Labor.

summary.text: Provides loans to local governments required to comply with occupational safety and health standards under State plans approved by the Secretary of Labor pursuant to the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970. States that such loans may be made only for that part of the cost of compliance in excess of $5,000.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 to provide loans to certain local governments required to comply with occupational safety and health standards under State plans approved by the Secretary of Labor.
